transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_020786.3 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000311765.3. The two transcripts differ at the 3'UTR.

contact.name: Sirisha Hesketh
contact.address: Oxford Genetics Laboratories, Oxford University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust, The Churchill Hospital, Oxford, UK
